item.title: American Airlines shares tumble as outlook falls short
SK Hynix profit soars to a record high on AI boom, but shares drop on demand uncertainty
item.description: SK Hynix CFO Kim Woohyun said that the outlook for memory demand in 2025 was clouded by inventory adjustments, protective trade policies and geopoliti...

item.title: Netflix shares soar as company reports surging revenue, tops 300 million subscribers
item.description: The fourth quarter was the last for which Netflix will report quarterly paid subscriber counts.

item.title: EA shares drop 7% after company lowers guidance due to weakness in soccer, other games
item.description: Electronic Arts slashed its full-year guidance on Wednesday, blaming the shortfall on underperforming games, in particular, its soccer franchise.

item.title: Abbott shares climb despite a mixed quarter. What we want to see before we buy more
item.description: Shares of Abbott Laboratories rose more than 1% in Wednesday's session.
